thread.title: BRIEF-Ormat Technologies Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.48

title: BRIEF-Ormat Technologies Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.48
text:
May 7 (Reuters) - Ormat Technologies Inc:
* ORMAT TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.88 * Q1 REVENUE $184 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $176.7 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.59 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* UPDATE FULL-YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE TO INCLUDE FINANCIAL CONTRIBUTION OF U.S. GEOTHERMAL’S ASSETS
* EXPECT 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA BETWEEN $368.0 MILLION AND $378.0 MILLION FOR FULL YEAR
* NOW EXPECT 2018 TOTAL REVENUE BETWEEN $711.0 MILLION AND $735.0 MILLION
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $710.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
Our
